|brand = AzureWave |model = AW-CB161 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = H |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/30/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AzureWave_AW-CB161H |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8821 |subvendor_id = 1a3b |subdevice_id = 2161 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8821AE, TLZ-CB161H |icid = 6317A-RTL8821AE |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 54:27:1E
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8821AE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/10/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B012IBJ2PM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00HRFS1GQ |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC test report states that there are two configurations of the EUT: *1: HMC, PCIe, Diversity antenna conifguration, I-PEX (U.FL compatible) RF connector *2: HMC, PCIe, Fixed antenna conifguration, I-PEX (U.FL compatible) RF connector
[[AzureWave Wireless Adapters]] *[[AzureWave AW-CB161H]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8821AE (1T1R 802.11ac) BT 4.0 :''ASUS'' M21AC (Desktop PC) models ([http://forum.ubuntuusers.de/topic/treiber-fuer-wlan-modul-installieren/ forums topic]) :10ec:8821 (1a3b:2161) PCI ID (''AzureWave'' subsystem)
